items.caption: Set apToken with password
detail: No longer need to separately set apiToken, but use password as apiToken

items.caption: Fix loading prompt
detail: The problem of loading prompt continuously displaying and not closing when modifying parameter errors

table: Set apToken with password
使用password来设置apiToken
No longer need to separately set apiToken, but use password as apiToken
不再单独设定apiToken，而是使用密码作为apiToken，避免因大多数用户不明白apiToken的用处而不知如何使用
Fix loading prompt
修正loading提示
The problem of loading prompt continuously displaying and not closing when modifying parameter errors
修改参数错误时loading提示一直显示不会关闭的问题

암호를사용하여apToken설정
No longer need to separately set apiToken, but use password as apiToken
apiToken을개별적으로설정하지않고암호를apiToken으로사용
Fix loading prompt
로드프롬프트수정
The problem of loading prompt continuously displaying and not closing when modifying parameter errors
매개변수오류를수정할때닫지않는문제가계속표시되도록프롬프트를로드합니다.
Set apToken with password
パスワードを使用したapTokenの設定
No longer need to separately set apiToken, but use password as apiToken
apiTokenを個別に設定する必要はなくなり、apiTokenとしてパスワードを使用
Fix loading prompt
リペアロードのヒント
The problem of loading prompt continuously displaying and not closing when modifying parameter errors
パラメータエラーの修正時にロードプロンプトが表示され続けて閉じない問題
